comments: Tests are not even from study guides has attitude problem, laughs and smirks when you fail a test
THE WORST TEACH EVER..... LITERALLY. SHE CAN NOT TEACH. YOU CAN NOT UNDERSTAND A THING SHE IS SAYING. IDK WHAT OAKTON WAS THINKING WHEN THEY HIRED HER... I hate biology because of her.
It maybe better if she just wrote out what she wants us to do rather than trying to explain it verbally....

gives extra credit at the end of the semester. had 1 take home test cos we were running behind schedule. labs are boring. 1 or 2 homework assignments. she throws in some pop quizes sometimes. takes attendance. you\'re able to drop 1 test and 2 quizes. put in a little effort of studying and youll do fine. don\'t need book too much

She knows her stuff, but can\'t teach it to save her life. None of us can understand her, she makes the easiest material very confusing, and we didn\'t even get to the last 3 chapters of the class because she has no lesson plans and can\'t keep track of time. I\'m dreading 121 because I barely understood 101 thanks to her.

My friends warned me not to take her but I did since there was only one good comment about her. After taking her class and failing, I should\'ve listened to my friends! This teacher is so HARD!!! I lost my interest in biology and with that my grade is far from gone thanks to her! She is THE WORST TEACHER EVER and can\'t teach anything!!!

This teacher is the worst teacher ever! I mean first she says that attendance isn\'t mandatory and then marks off points for people who are late. Her clarity is horrible and her grading is very strict- without partial credit. She\'s not a teacher, she\'s a bully- DO NOT TAKE HER, SAVE YOUR GRADE!!!

Took it over the summer. Thought it was fairly easy. I really didn\'t do anything outside of class and got an A. Don\'t really understand the harsh criticism. She has an accent but is easy to understand, she answered all questions, exams were from the lectures. I hate science and thought it was a pretty easy course. Just put in enough effort.
